scenario_text.value:
Yeah. Let’s take cover here and see what’s
going on.

Takuma, is it true that the remnants of
Piemon’s forces are here?

In a rock’s shadow some distance away. More
importantly, is that the aforementioned gang?

A bunch of Kemonogami are surrounding
something? Wait...isn’t that...?!
Ugh... I didn’t expect so many survivors...!
Beg for mercy in the afterlife!

You can’t escape! We’ll finish you off right
here and now!

I’m sorry, Takuma, but could I ask for your
help here?

You remember what he did at the altar, don’t
you? He...he must be...!

You got it! All riiight, let’s go save
Garurumon!
